name: Bols & Wols
description:
Experiment with balls and walls to create a marble run or just experiment with different settings including Gravity, Friction, and Bounciness

Controls:

R - Restart

Backspace - Delete

Left click - Spawn wall

Right click and Hold - Spawn ball (How long you hold is how big the ball gets)

Shift when hovering over a ball - Drag ball

G - Spawn ball with the same size as the last ball you spawned.

C - Color

S - Settings (where you can change a ball's features)

Left click on a setting - Move number up

Right click on a setting - Move number down
